name: Think Circle Inc
tag_list: graphics, web, motion-graphics, animations, storyboard, design, script, video-production, audio
overview:
About A complete design studio

Mission to get fixed hr freelance projects online and offline.

Description Fast - Reliable - Quick Professional

With 13 years of experience of my in design and motion graphics I stand tall amongst the leading multimedia providers worldwide.

Think Circle was established in 2011 and within this short period it has proved to be one of the leading design and motion graphics studio operating worldwide.

Think Circle functions as a individual who is Graphic Designer, Animator, Fine Artist, Photographer, film maker, Music producer,interior designer,apparel designer, logo designer, printer and Daydreamer.

I qualified master degree in Film and Television studies and bachelors degree in graphic designing . I am highly skilled in my line of work and always exceed expectations. I work for clients from all over the world and take great pride in developing fresh concepts and extremely high quality products.

I only work on fixed hours rate jobs.
